p.s: At April 7 in 2009 the US President Barack Obama gave a speech at a student roundtable in Istanbul before he started a discussion.
In his speech Obama saissays that he wants to rebuild the relationship between the USA and the Muslim world.

In lines 9 and 10 he emphaticsemphasizes that [he] like to find new ways to connect young Americans to young people all around the world and that he wants to welcoming students from other countries in the USA (ll. 11, 12).
In line 13 he saissays a quote got ofdenoften recited: Simple exchanges can break down walls between us.
Later in his speech he also emphaticsemphazises that we, the young people can choose whether we build new bridges instead of building new walls (ll. 18, 19).
In the end of his speech Obama saissays that he wants that the young poeplepeople findsfind a partner and supporter or friend in the United States.
